Class PongResizeController

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.event.ComponentAdapter
      • pong.PongResizeController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ComponentListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class PongResizeController
extends java.awt.event.ComponentAdapter
    This class is an event handler for when the Pong's panel is resized.

    bylander
